title: A Tale of the Eternal Stones: Firestone
description: What if you were told there was a 'great sadness' coming and you were the only one who could save the world? What would you do? Could you leave your family and friends to face unknown dangers in an untamed world full of monsters, magic and misfits? If Roeg Stonehold'r stands any kind of chance, he must first overcome his inner demons.Far to the west, on the island of Atlantea, a girl named Sephonei is conscripted into the League of Crystal Hunters by force and sent on a journey to the mainland in search of a powerful Eternal Stone, said to grant the power of immortality.Little do they know its a race, and that they are searching for the same eternal stone... when will their journeys intertwine?
author: Ryan Carriere
